MESSAGE.EN: Message: [I'm staying at Kengo's room tonight.]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [I'm staying at Kengo's room tonight.]

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか、考え事が一杯あって、ちょうどひとりでいたいところだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I actually wanted to be alone since I had a lot of things to think about.
MESSAGE.Translation: I actually wanted to be alone since I had a lot of things to think about.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、真人はそんなところに気を遣ってくれたのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps Masato had realized that and was showing consideration in his own way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps Masato had realized that and was showing consideration in his own way.

MESSAGE.JP: 『ありがとう』と一言打って、返信する。
すぐにまた返信。
…『おう』と、たった二文字。
何も聞かないでくれる、そのぶっきらぼうな二文字が、今は本当にありがたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm feeling pretty grateful that he didn't ask any questions.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm feeling pretty grateful that he didn't ask any questions.

MESSAGE.JP: 電気を消して、目を閉じた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned off the light and closed my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned off the light and closed my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 考える。
…どうしてこんなことになったのか。
`理樹@（だいじょうぶ、かな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I wonder if it's going to be all right...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I wonder if it's going to be all right...)

MESSAGE.JP: 寝て起きて…。
MESSAGE.EN: As I drifted to sleep I hoped...
MESSAGE.Translation: As I drifted to sleep I hoped...

MESSAGE.JP: 明日、全部戻ってる事を祈りながら、眠りについた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...everything would be back to normal when I woke up again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...everything would be back to normal when I woke up again.

MESSAGE.JP: 朝。
みんなに断りのメールを送って、先に女子寮へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed to the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed to the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんに電話を掛けてみたけど、それが繋がる事はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had tried to call Komari-san, but she didn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had tried to call Komari-san, but she didn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、何とかして直接確かめるしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: So I had to go and see how she was doing in person.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I had to go and see how she was doing in person.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮から出てくる女生徒の中に、クラスメイトの姿を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: On the way to the dorm, I singled out a classmate from a group of girls going in the direction of the school.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the way to the dorm, I singled out a classmate from a group of girls going in the direction of the school.

MESSAGE.JP: 体調が悪そうだったから、という理由で様子を見に行ってもらうように頼む。
MESSAGE.EN: I told her I was worried about Komari-san because she was sick, and asked her if she could go and see how she was doing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told her I was worried about Komari-san because she was sick, and asked her if she could go and see how she was doing.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと不思議そうな顔をされたけど、快く引き受けてもらえた。
MESSAGE.EN: At first the girl had a quizzical look, but she readily accepted my request.
MESSAGE.Translation: At first the girl had a quizzical look, but she readily accepted my request.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとして、頼んだクラスメイトが戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She came back a while later.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came back a while later.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「直枝君が待ってるって言ったら、来るって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝I told her you're waiting, and she said she'd show up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝I told her you're waiting, and she said she'd show up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そう…」
だいじょうぶなんだろうか。
`女生徒@「…でも、なんか泣いてたみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝...But it looked like she had been crying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝...But it looked like she had been crying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、ありがとうと告げて、その場で待つことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave her my thanks and decided to wait there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave her my thanks and decided to wait there.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが玄関に出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She came out of the front door.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came out of the front door.

MESSAGE.JP: …力なく歩いてくる。
`理樹@「小毬さん…」
目が真っ赤だった。
…そんなになるくらい、ずっと泣いていたんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Had she been crying all this time...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Had she been crying all this time...?

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…理樹君」
いきなり抱きつかれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Out of nowhere she hugged me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Out of nowhere she hugged me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと小毬さん…」
`小毬@「だいじょうぶだよね…」
`小毬@「どこにも行ったりしないよね？」
`理樹@「…うん」
僕には、ただ頷く事しかできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was all I could say.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was all I could say.

MESSAGE.JP: 教室についても、小毬さんは魂が抜けたようにじっとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even in the classroom she held still as if her spirit had left her body.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even in the classroom she held still as if her spirit had left her body.

MESSAGE.JP: どこか虚ろな目で、あらぬ場所をじっと見詰めている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was staring at some obscure spot with lifeless eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was staring at some obscure spot with lifeless eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 朝から、笑い顔なんて一度も見ていない。
MESSAGE.EN: She hadn't smiled since I met her this morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hadn't smiled since I met her this morning.

MESSAGE.JP: 悪い予感がする…。
そんなの、杞憂でしかないかもしれないけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It might be just pointless worrying, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: It might be just pointless worrying, but...

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、今の小毬さんを見ていると、酷く不安な気持ちになる。
MESSAGE.EN: Nevertheless, I couldn't help but be really concerned about her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nevertheless, I couldn't help but be really concerned about her.

MESSAGE.JP: …もう、これ以上、何も起きて欲しくないのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was hoping with all my heart that things wouldn't turn any worse...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was hoping with all my heart that things wouldn't turn any worse...

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間、恭介の教室へ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: During a recess I visited Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: During a recess I visited Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 深刻な話だと察してくれたのか、人の少ない階段へ移動する事になった。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently, he quickly realized the seriousness of my business, so he suggested we move to a landing where nobody else was around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently, he quickly realized the seriousness of my business, so he suggested we move to a landing where nobody else was around.

`理樹@「うん…」
`理樹@「元気なくしちゃって…」
`理樹@「僕、どうしたらいいのか…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I have no clue what to do...❞

頷くしかなかった。
`恭介@「悪いが、理樹…おまえがどうにかするしかないと思う」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, Riki... but that's something you've got to deal with yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕に、って…」
`恭介@「…俺は事情を知らない」
`恭介@「それに、今更その事情だけ聞いたところで、なにが出来るか…見当もつかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And even if you told me, I don't think that I could figure out what to do about it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And even if you told me, I don't think that I could figure out what to do about it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そりゃそうだけど…」
`恭介@「理樹」
`恭介@「今の小毬にはおまえが必要なんだろう」
`恭介@「…だとしたら、元気付ける事が出来るのはおまえだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And you are the only one who can possibly cheer her up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And you are the only one who can possibly cheer her up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 元気付けること、か…。
恭介と別れて、教室に戻る事にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I parted ways with him and returned to my classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I parted ways with him and returned to my classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君っ」
`理樹@「えっ…」
`小毬@「どこにも…行かないって…」
泣きそうな声で呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: She was on the verge of crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was on the verge of crying.

MESSAGE.JP: …そして、僕に抱きつくと、声も上げないで、泣き出してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And then she held onto me and the tears flooded out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And then she held onto me and the tears flooded out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そんな…だいじょうぶだよ…」
肩を支えながら、言い聞かせる。
MESSAGE.EN: I appeased her as I held her trembling shoulders.
MESSAGE.Translation: I appeased her as I held her trembling shoulders.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕はどこにも行かないから…」
…小毬さんは、ただ元気がないだけなんかじゃない。
だけじゃ、ないんだ…。
`小毬@「おにいちゃんっ…」
…どうする事も、出来ないじゃないか…。
翌日。
いつもより早起きをする。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up earlier than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up earlier than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: …というか、明け方に目を覚まして、それ以降眠れなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...To be precise, I woke up at dawn and wasn't able to fall back asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...To be precise, I woke up at dawn and wasn't able to fall back asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんはいつも遅刻寸前の僕らと違って、教室には早く着いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san arrives in the classroom every morning ahead of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san arrives in the classroom every morning ahead of us.

MESSAGE.JP: …いつも通りなら、そのはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...If she was her usual self, she should do that today as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...If she was her usual self, she should do that today as well.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか、早くその様子を見たかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, I was eager to find out as soon as possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, I was eager to find out as soon as possible.

MESSAGE.JP: 学食で食事を済ませ、一度戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: Having finished my breakfast at the cafeteria, I started back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having finished my breakfast at the cafeteria, I started back.

MESSAGE.JP: …学校へ向かう途中、小毬さんの姿を見かけた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...On the way to school I found Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...On the way to school I found Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さん」
振り向く。
`小毬@「おはよう、おにいちゃん」
`理樹@「違うよ…僕は理樹だよ」
`小毬@「理樹君」
`理樹@「うん」
`小毬@「今日はいい天気ですね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's so nice outside today, isn't it～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's so nice outside today, isn't it～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 唐突にいつもの口調に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: She suddenly returned to her usual way of speaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: She suddenly returned to her usual way of speaking.

MESSAGE.JP: 戸惑うのはこっちだ。
…それに、灰色の空からはもう、雨が降り始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Rain had already started falling from the murky sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Rain had already started falling from the murky sky.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…前のこと、もうだいじょうぶなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Did you get over... that thing from before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Did you get over... that thing from before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「まえ？」
`小毬@「なにかあったっけ…」
`小毬@「…変なこと言うね、理樹君」
くすくすと笑う。
…忘れてる…。
でも…。
時折見せる虚ろな目と、前みたいに笑わないのは…昨日と同じだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The smile didn't reach her eyes, which looked hollow... just like yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smile didn't reach her eyes, which looked hollow... just like yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: …教室についてからも、小毬さんは普段と変わらないように振舞っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Nevertheless, she was acting the same as always in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Nevertheless, she was acting the same as always in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 二時間目の休み時間。
MESSAGE.EN: The recess after the second class.
MESSAGE.Translation: The recess after the second class.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「次は移動教室だよ～」
`理樹@「うん…」
…本当に、普段と変わらないように見えた。
`謙吾@「仲がいいな、ふたりとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You guys sure are getting along well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You guys sure are getting along well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: からかうように謙吾が言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo spoke out in a teasing voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo spoke out in a teasing voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、私とおにいちゃんはなかよしさんなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yes, Onii-chan and I are very close.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yes, Onii-chan and I are very close.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…おにい…？」
`理樹@「小毬さんっ」
…小毬さんの手を掴んで、廊下に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I grabbed her hand and pulled her out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I grabbed her hand and pulled her out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…どうしたの？」
`理樹@「僕はお兄さんじゃないよ…」
`理樹@「僕は直枝理樹だよ」
`小毬@「じゃあ、おにいちゃんどこ？」
`理樹@「…もういないって、思い出したんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Didn't you remember that he isn't alive...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't you remember that he isn't alive...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…いるよ」
僕を指差す。
`小毬@「理樹君、大好きであったかい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You are warm, and I love you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You are warm, and I love you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…だからおにいちゃん」
くすくすと笑う。
`理樹@「…僕は…」
…言いかけて、止めた。
小毬さんは、僕をお兄さん代わりにしようとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san must be trying to replace her deceased brother with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san must be trying to replace her deceased brother with me.

MESSAGE.JP: …それを完全に否定したら…。
また、壊れてしまうかもしれない。
`理樹@（いや…）
今だって、とっくに壊れてしまっている。
MESSAGE.EN: She is actually broken already, right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: She is actually broken already, right now.

MESSAGE.JP: なんで…。
`理樹@（何でこんなことに…）
昼休み。
…授業が終わってすぐ、小毬さんはどこかに姿を消してしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as the last morning class was over, Komari-san was gone right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as the last morning class was over, Komari-san was gone right away.

MESSAGE.JP: 外は、雨。
`理樹@「まさか…」
屋上へ続く階段。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran up the stairs leading to the roof.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran up the stairs leading to the roof.

MESSAGE.JP: …窓の下に置かれた椅子の足元に、ドライバーとネジが転がっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...On the chair by the window were a driver and several detached screws.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...On the chair by the window were a driver and several detached screws.

MESSAGE.JP: 屋上に出る。
`理樹@「小毬さんっ」
声を掛けた。
`小毬@「あ…おにいちゃん」
…ずぶ濡れだった。
ずぶ濡れで、ただ屋上の真ん中に、暗い瞳のままで立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was just standing there in the center of the roof with dark, hollow eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was just standing there in the center of the roof with dark, hollow eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何でこんなとこに…」
`小毬@「屋上」
`小毬@「好きだから」
ふと、小毬さんの足元に気付く。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed there was something down by her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed there was something down by her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: …ぐしゃぐしゃになった絵本。
拓也さんが最後に残した、絵本。
MESSAGE.EN: The one Takuya-san had given her as his last present.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one Takuya-san had given her as his last present.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんっ！」
僕はそれを取り上げる。
…表紙はすっかり濡れてしまっていて、絵の具はにじみ、それがなんであったかすらわからなくなってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The front cover was so wet it was impossible to read what was written on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The front cover was so wet it was impossible to read what was written on it.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「さっき落としちゃったんだ」
`理樹@「何で、こんな…」
`小毬@「…いいよ、欲しかったらあげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...You can keep it if you want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...You can keep it if you want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あげるって…」
`理樹@「大事なものだったでしょ、これ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is important to you, isn't it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is important to you, isn't it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大好きな絵本じゃないか…」
`小毬@「…うん」
`小毬@「でも、もうどうだっていいんだ、また作ってもらうから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But it's all the same. You'll make me another one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But it's all the same. You'll make me another one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな…」
`小毬@「あれ…」
気付いたように顔を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted her head as though having noticed something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted her head as though having noticed something.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「白いひらひらがないね」
`小毬@「あったほうが楽しいのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It would be more fun if they were.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It would be more fun if they were.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おにいちゃん、また追いかけっこしよう」
…言いながら、くすくすと笑う。
`理樹@「…もう、やだよ…」
`理樹@「そんな風に笑わないでよ…」
`理樹@「そんな目、しないでよ…」
`理樹@「小毬さんの目は、ステキなものをいっぱい見つけられる目だったじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your eyes should be able to see so many awesome things, shouldn't they...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your eyes should be able to see so many awesome things, shouldn't they...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…ステキなもの？」
`理樹@「そうだよ」
`小毬@「…いらないよ、そんなの」
`小毬@「おにいちゃんがいればそれでいいや」
…叫びたくなった。
小毬さんの目は、完全に閉ざされてしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Now her eyes were completely closed off from the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now her eyes were completely closed off from the world.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕にいっぱい教えてくれたでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You taught me so many great things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You taught me so many great things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「知らない…わかんない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I don't know... I have no idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I don't know... I have no idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それより、お話聞きたいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That aside, I want you to tell me a story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That aside, I want you to tell me a story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほら、この本お話がいっぱい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Look, this book has lots of stories in it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Look, this book has lots of stories in it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一冊のノートを取り出す。
`理樹@「それ…小毬さんが自分で描いたノートじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's... a picture book you made yourself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's... a picture book you made yourself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「知らないそんなの」
`小毬@「私、こんなの描けない…」
…こんなの…。
…こんなの、いやだ…!!
…小毬さんの手を引いて、屋上を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I took her by the hand and left the roof.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I took her by the hand and left the roof.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…早退しよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...We're skipping the rest of the classes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...We're skipping the rest of the classes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？」
`理樹@「小毬さん、女子寮に戻って」
`理樹@「…少し、休んでよ」
`小毬@「…おにいちゃん、変なこと言うね」
`小毬@「私はとっても元気だよ」
`理樹@「小毬さんは…」
心を病んでるんだ…。
途中、鈴の姿を見かけた。
MESSAGE.EN: On the way to the dorm section, we ran across Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the way to the dorm section, we ran across Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴」
声を掛ける。
鈴の音をさせて振り向く。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned to face us with a cling of the bell.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned to face us with a cling of the bell.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「りんちゃん、こんにちは」
`理樹@「あのさ、僕ら早退するから、うまいこと言っといてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, can you tell the teacher we're leaving early?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, can you tell the teacher we're leaving early?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ？　具合悪いのか？」
`小毬@「くすくす…変だよね」
`小毬@「私元気なのに、おにいちゃんが早退しろって言うの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Onii-chan insists I need a rest, even though I'm this fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Onii-chan insists I need a rest, even though I'm this fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おにいちゃん？」
`理樹@「…とにかく、お願いっ」
小毬さんの手を引いて歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Holding Komari-san by the hand I began promptly walking away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Holding Komari-san by the hand I began promptly walking away.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあね、りんちゃん」
…小毬さんが口を開くたびに、やりきれない気持ちが溢れてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Every word Komari-san spoke felt like a stab to my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every word Komari-san spoke felt like a stab to my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮につくと、寮母さんを呼んで小毬さんを部屋に連れて行ってくれるようにお願いした。
MESSAGE.EN: Once we reached the girls' dorm, I asked the dorm mother to take Komari-san to her room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once we reached the girls' dorm, I asked the dorm mother to take Komari-san to her room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、ちょっとお願いします」
`寮母@「それはいいけど」
`理樹@「小毬さん、部屋でゆっくり休むんだよ」
`小毬@「うん」
`寮母@「…なんだか兄妹みたいね、あなたたち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Mother@❝...You two look like brother and sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Mother@❝...You two look like brother and sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …冗談めいた寮母さんの言葉が、妙に痛かった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I knew she meant it as a joke, but it still hurt me a little on the inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I knew she meant it as a joke, but it still hurt me a little on the inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮を後にすると、僕は校門を飛び出した。
MESSAGE.EN: After leaving the dorm behind, I dashed out of the school gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: After leaving the dorm behind, I dashed out of the school gate.

MESSAGE.JP: …小次郎さんのところに行くんだ。
あの人以外に、小毬さんのことを知っている人を、僕は知らない。
MESSAGE.EN: He was the only one I knew of who should know everything about Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was the only one I knew of who should know everything about Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: …このままなんて、絶対嫌だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I really wanted to turn this situation for the better.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I really wanted to turn this situation for the better.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小次郎さんっ!!」
ドアを叩く。
`理樹@「小次郎さん、理樹です!!　入りますっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kojirou-san, it's me, Riki! I'm coming in!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kojirou-san, it's me, Riki! I'm coming in!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 返事も待たずに、中に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: I entered before he could answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I entered before he could answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 小次郎さんは、窓の外をじっと見つめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He was staring out of the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was staring out of the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 気付いていないんだろうか…？
`理樹@「小次郎さん…？」
もう一度声を掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I called his name yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called his name yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: …少し間を置いて。
`小次郎@「なんじゃ、小僧か…騒々しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝It's just you, kid... You should be more quiet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝It's just you, kid... You should be more quiet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…ずぶ濡れじゃな。学校はどうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...You're all wet. Aren't you supposed to be at school?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...You're all wet. Aren't you supposed to be at school?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんが…小毬さんが…!!」
`小次郎@「何かあったのか」
`理樹@「教えてください、小毬さん、どうしてあんなことにっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you please tell me what made her like that!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you please tell me what made her like that!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「落ち着け小僧」
`小次郎@「…この話を聞くなら、冷静なほうがよい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...You need your wits about you if you wish to know the truth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...You need your wits about you if you wish to know the truth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「落ち着いてなんていられないよっ！」
`小次郎@「くわああああああああああああああっ!!!!」
…思わず身を引いた。
`小次郎@「…落ち着いたか」
`理樹@「は、はい…」
`小次郎@「先に言っておこう。数週間でおそらくもとの小娘に戻る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝First of all, she'll return to normal in a few weeks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝First of all, she'll return to normal in a few weeks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前にもこんなことが？」
`小次郎@「うむ、まず状況を話せ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝No. Anyway, first tell me the situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝No. Anyway, first tell me the situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …小次郎さんに小毬さんの様子を伝える。
`小次郎@「…発端はなんじゃ」
`小次郎@「小毬が見たのは血か？　それとも何かの死か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝Did she witness blood? Or some sort of death?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝Did she witness blood? Or some sort of death?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…死って…」
`小次郎@「あの娘の中にある引き金はその二つじゃ」
`小次郎@「…わしが直接目にしたのは…」
`小次郎@「わしが喀血した時のことじゃった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝When I coughed up blood in front of her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝When I coughed up blood in front of her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「喀血はたいしたことではない。とうに胸掻っ捌いてデキモン取ってあるわい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝Nothing to worry about. I already had the tumor removed years ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝Nothing to worry about. I already had the tumor removed years ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…じゃが、その姿を見た小毬は…」
泣き叫び、崩れ落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: And then burst into tears and broke down.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then burst into tears and broke down.

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…見るに耐えぬ姿だったらしい」
`小次郎@「呆けた表情で兄はどこだと探し回る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝She started looking for her brother, completely out of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝She started looking for her brother, completely out of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「次の日、そのことはすっかり忘れ、兄と過ごしていた頃と今を混同し始める」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝The next day she forgot about the previous day, and mixed reality with the days she shared with him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝The next day she forgot about the previous day, and mixed reality with the days she shared with him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…そして段々とそのことすらも忘れていく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...And then she gradually even forgot about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...And then she gradually even forgot about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「その時のほかにも、飼っていた魚の死を見たとき、道端で轢かれて死んでいた猫をみたときにも、同じような状態になったと聞き及んでおる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝Other than that, the same thing happened when she saw a dead cat by a roadside, and when her fish died.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝Other than that, the same thing happened when she saw a dead cat by a roadside, and when her fish died.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、こんなことを何度も繰り返してきたの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's kept repeating this over and over...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's kept repeating this over and over...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「うむ…」
…だから、小毬さんにお兄さんの死を、誰も教えなかったのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: That must be why nobody has told Komari-san about her brother's death.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must be why nobody has told Komari-san about her brother's death.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、教えたとしても、その事は忘れてしまうんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, even if somebody had told her she would have definitely just forgotten about it...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, even if somebody had told her she would have definitely just forgotten about it...

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…フラッシュバックといったか」
`小次郎@「兄の死で受けた激情が再現されておるのじゃろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝She feels anew the deep sorrow from her brother's death every time the trigger is set off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝She feels anew the deep sorrow from her brother's death every time the trigger is set off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「抑圧されとる間、幾重にも増幅されてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝And with the passing of time, the feelings only become stronger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝And with the passing of time, the feelings only become stronger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな…」
死と、血。
これまで、血くらいは何度も見てきたはずだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd seen blood any number of times before, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd seen blood any number of times before, but...

MESSAGE.JP: 多分、それはお兄さんのことを…死を連想させるものだったときに、引き金になるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That had probably become the trigger when she repeatedly imagined her brother... and his death.
MESSAGE.Translation: That had probably become the trigger when she repeatedly imagined her brother... and his death.

MESSAGE.JP: それは…拓也さんの、小毬さんを悲しませないための言葉のせいだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: That was probably because of the words that Takuya-san said in order to not make Komari-san sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was probably because of the words that Takuya-san said in order to not make Komari-san sad.

MESSAGE.JP: 逃げても、いつかまた襲ってくる…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if she tries to run away, it keeps following her and will some day strike again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if she tries to run away, it keeps following her and will some day strike again.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな、呪いみたいなこと、拓也さんだって望んでなかったはずだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't imagine that was what Takuya-san had been hoping for...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't imagine that was what Takuya-san had been hoping for...

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…それで、今は小僧を兄と呼ぶのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...So, does she think you are her brother?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...So, does she think you are her brother?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
`小次郎@「小僧は余程好かれておったと見える」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝I see she likes you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝I see she likes you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「おぬしは兄を演じるつもりか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝Are you going to play the role of her brother?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝Are you going to play the role of her brother?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…代わりが見つかったとなれば、小毬はそれを求めるじゃろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...Once she finds a suitable person, she will want to substitute her original brother with them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...Once she finds a suitable person, she will want to substitute her original brother with them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで、今回みたいなことはなくなるんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you think she'll stop being like that if I become a substitute?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you think she'll stop being like that if I become a substitute?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…早く忘れるだけじゃろう」
`小次郎@「同じように引き金に触れればまた壊れる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝And she would keep breaking whenever she faced one of the triggers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝And she would keep breaking whenever she faced one of the triggers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…こまりもそうじゃった」
`小次郎@「わしの連れじゃ」
`小次郎@「言ったろう、似すぎておると」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝I told you she and my wife were too much alike.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝I told you she and my wife were too much alike.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小次郎さんは、窓の外に眼をやる。
`小次郎@「わしはちょうどお前と同じ立場じゃった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝I used to be in the same spot where you are now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝I used to be in the same spot where you are now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「わしの兄は、拓也と同じように、血を吐いて死んだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝My older brother coughed up blood and died, much like Takuya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝My older brother coughed up blood and died, much like Takuya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…こまりは、わしの兄を好いておって…」
`小次郎@「その兄を、探して泣き叫ぶ日々が続いた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝She was crying her eyes out and kept looking for him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝She was crying her eyes out and kept looking for him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「わしは…そんなこまりを助けてやりたかった」
…同じだった。
どこまでも、それは同じだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's exactly the same as what's happening with us right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's exactly the same as what's happening with us right now.

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「いつしか、こまりはわしを兄と錯覚するようになった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝Soon after she began to confuse me with him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝Soon after she began to confuse me with him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「わしも、そうすることでこまりを助けることとした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝By becoming his substitute, I tried to help her out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝By becoming his substitute, I tried to help her out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「そうすることで、こまりは少しばかりの平穏を取り戻すことが出来た」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝That seemed to work and she went back to normal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝That seemed to work and she went back to normal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…そのときは、それが正しいと信じたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...I did believe at that time that what I did for her was the right thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...I did believe at that time that what I did for her was the right thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「しかし…それは、何の解決にもならなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝However... it turned out that I hadn't solved anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝However... it turned out that I hadn't solved anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「繰り返し、思い出しては…心をすり減らす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝She kept remembering about him over and over again, and it wore out her mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝She kept remembering about him over and over again, and it wore out her mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「そのときには、わしにはもう、どうすることも出来んかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝By that time there was nothing else I could do anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝By that time there was nothing else I could do anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「じゃが、連れがわしをわしじゃと認めた最後の三日が在った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝But for her last three days she recognized me for who I really was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝But for her last three days she recognized me for who I really was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…その三日がなければ、わしはこまりを連れとも呼べんかったじゃろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...Without those days I couldn't have regarded her as my wife.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...Without those days I couldn't have regarded her as my wife.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「結局…時間ばかりかけ、わしはこまりを…救えんかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝In the end I wasn't able to save her, despite enormous time and effort.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝In the end I wasn't able to save her, despite enormous time and effort.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「後悔ばかりが残った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝All I got from it is regret.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝All I got from it is regret.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…昔の話だ。どうでもよい」
`理樹@「じゃあ、代わりにならなかったら…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What if I refuse to be a substitute for Takuya-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What if I refuse to be a substitute for Takuya-san...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…わからん」
`理樹@「そんな…」
`小次郎@「そのままということもありうる」
`小次郎@「また忘れるということもありうる」
`小次郎@「…どうする、小僧」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...What are you going to do, kid?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...What are you going to do, kid?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、僕が代わりになっても解決しないんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought playing Takuya-san would solve the problem, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought playing Takuya-san would solve the problem, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこでふと、自分の言葉を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly remember what I had told her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly remember what I had told her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…僕じゃ代わりになれないかな」
`理樹@「その、お兄さんの代わり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean, a substitute for your brother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean, a substitute for your brother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お兄さんの夢を見るのが幸せならさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If dreaming of him makes you happy,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If dreaming of him makes you happy,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…それまででも、それからでも、僕がその代わりになってあげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I want to take his place to make you happy until you next dream of him, and even after you dream of him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I want to take his place to make you happy until you next dream of him, and even after you dream of him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 馬鹿だ…。
僕は馬鹿だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: What an idiot I have been...
MESSAGE.Translation: What an idiot I have been...

MESSAGE.JP: 逃げたって、しょうがないんだ…。
`小次郎@「小僧、自分を責めるな」
`理樹@「だって…」
`理樹@「僕があんなこと言わなければ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I hadn't told her something like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I hadn't told her something like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「小僧のせいではない」
`理樹@「だって…もし知ってたら、あんなこと…」
`小次郎@「では知っておれば『あんなこと』にはならなかったと言うのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...❛She wouldn't have become like that,❜ you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...❛She wouldn't have become like that,❜ you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうじゃないけど…」
`小次郎@「後悔などしたところで、解決はせん」
`理樹@「じゃあ、どうやって、何をすればいいんですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then what am I supposed to do for her and how...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then what am I supposed to do for her and how...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「小僧。わしは逃げた人間じゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝Kid, I am one who ran away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝Kid, I am one who ran away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「それも、二回もな」
`小次郎@「…ここにいることも逃げじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...Even the reason I came here is just to escape.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...Even the reason I came here is just to escape.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「いつどうなるかなど、誰にもわからん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝No one knows what the future holds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝No one knows what the future holds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「あの娘の目の前でわしが死んだらどうなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝What if I died right in front of her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝What if I died right in front of her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「少なくとも…小僧達よりはわしのほうが早く逝くじゃろうからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝At the very least... I don't think I will live longer than you kids.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝At the very least... I don't think I will live longer than you kids.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうか。
だから小次郎さんは小毬さんを近づけようとしないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the reason why he's kept Komari-san away from himself.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the reason why he's kept Komari-san away from himself.

MESSAGE.JP: …寂しいだろうに、小毬さんのために…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He must have wanted to see her and talk to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He must have wanted to see her and talk to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「わしは…後悔しておる」
`小次郎@「何か他に方法はなかったのか、とな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝I can't help thinking there could have been some other way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝I can't help thinking there could have been some other way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「じゃからわしに聞いても無駄じゃ。小僧が自身で解決するより他あるまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝So there's no advice I can give you. You have to deal with it yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝So there's no advice I can give you. You have to deal with it yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…わかんないよ、そんなの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I don't know what to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I don't know what to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「誰にだってわからんのじゃ」
`小次郎@「過去は取り戻しようもない」
`小次郎@「…起こってしまったものは、誰にも取り返しようがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...You can't do over what has been done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...You can't do over what has been done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、こんなの…」
…まるで、みんながみんなを好きになったから、起こった事みたいじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He makes it sound as though the cause of all this happening is that people loved each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He makes it sound as though the cause of all this happening is that people loved each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 拓也さんだって、小毬さんのことを想ってしたことが、引き金になってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Takuya-san loved Komari-san dearly, but what he did all for the sake of Komari-san has been crippling her instead...
MESSAGE.Translation: Takuya-san loved Komari-san dearly, but what he did all for the sake of Komari-san has been crippling her instead...

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんだって、ただ拓也さんのことが大好きだったってだけで…。
MESSAGE.EN: She loved him, but that's the reason she still can't forget about him, still needs him...
MESSAGE.Translation: She loved him, but that's the reason she still can't forget about him, still needs him...

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんに関わる人たちだって、どうしようもなくて…。
MESSAGE.EN: And even the other people around her who love her haven't been able to do anything about this problem...
MESSAGE.Translation: And even the other people around her who love her haven't been able to do anything about this problem...

MESSAGE.JP: 小次郎さんだって、小毬さんのために、たったひとりで、孤独に過ごしている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Same goes for Kojirou-san; he's been living all alone so as not to hurt Komari-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: Same goes for Kojirou-san; he's been living all alone so as not to hurt Komari-san...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕だって…」
`理樹@「小毬さんの笑ってる顔が好きなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I really like it the best when she smiles...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I really like it the best when she smiles...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんなやりきれない顔、見たくない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to see her the way she is right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to see her the way she is right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そうなんだ。
`理樹@「小次郎さん」
`小次郎@「なんじゃ」
`理樹@「僕にできること、何か探してみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll figure out what I can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll figure out what I can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きっと僕にしか出来ないこと、あると思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Perhaps there is something only I can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Perhaps there is something only I can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…そうか」
`小次郎@「救ってやってくれ」
`理樹@「…はい」
`小次郎@「話はこれまでじゃな」
`小次郎@「…もう、ジジイの長話に付き合う必要はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...You don't have to listen to any more boring stories of an old man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...You don't have to listen to any more boring stories of an old man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…来るなって事ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You mean you don't want me to come over here anymore?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You mean you don't want me to come over here anymore?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「わしはもう何も残しとうない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝I don't want to leave any more things behind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝I don't want to leave any more things behind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「忘れられたまま、ひっそりと逝くほうがええ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝I only want to pass away quietly without leaving anyone behind to remember me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝I only want to pass away quietly without leaving anyone behind to remember me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…」
`理樹@「…お断りします」
`理樹@「僕は小次郎さんから、もっと話を聞きたいですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because I want to hear more of your stories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because I want to hear more of your stories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それと、お礼の話なんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I've decided what I'd like you to do in return.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I've decided what I'd like you to do in return.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんに会ってあげて下さい」
`理樹@「きっと僕が、会えるようにしてあげますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I promise I will prepare everything for you to meet her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I promise I will prepare everything for you to meet her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「ふん、小僧が…」
`小次郎@「考えておこう」
`理樹@「はい」
`理樹@「…ありがとうございました」
頭を下げて、部屋を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I bowed my head and tried to leave the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bowed my head and tried to leave the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「待て、小僧」
`理樹@「え」
小次郎さんは立ち上がり、僕のほうへ歩み寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: He stood up and walked up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stood up and walked up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、僕の右腕をむんず、と掴むと、一枚の紙切れをその手に入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: And then he seized my right hand and stuffed a piece of paper in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then he seized my right hand and stuffed a piece of paper in it.

MESSAGE.JP: `小次郎@「…これで、用事は終わりじゃ。さっさと行けい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kojirou@❝...I'm finished. Hurry up and go already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kojirou@❝...I'm finished. Hurry up and go already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そのまま部屋を追い出される。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He kicked me out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He kicked me out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 外に出てから、小次郎さんの紙切れを開いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: Outside the room, I checked out the paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: Outside the room, I checked out the paper.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これ…」
どこかの墓地の住所と、道筋。
MESSAGE.EN: What was written on it was the address and directions for a graveyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: What was written on it was the address and directions for a graveyard.

MESSAGE.JP: …拓也さんに会いに行け、ということだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Am I supposed to go meet Takuya-san?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Am I supposed to go meet Takuya-san?

MESSAGE.JP: 行こう…。
きっと僕は、そうするべきなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's probably something I have to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's probably something I have to do.

SELECT.JP: 気付かない振りをすればいい$d真正面から向き合わなきゃいけない
SELECT.EN: Pretend not to notice anything$dFace reality head on
SELECT.Translation: Pretend not to notice anything$dFace reality head on

SELECT.JP: それじゃ何も解決しない$dそれが守るってことだ
SELECT.EN: That isn't going to get us anywhere$dIf it will protect another
SELECT.Translation: That isn't going to get us anywhere$dIf it will protect another
